alert.note: Alert for Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:00PM EDT until July 26 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hillsdale County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Addison, or 11 miles north of Hudson, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hillsdale, Jerome, Somerset, Moscow, North Adams, and Somerset Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
